events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application was categorized under the Engineering department, focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to facilitate your application process.
We conducted an initial screening to assess your skills and experience related to the software engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions. Your qualifications look promising.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM to evaluate your software engineering skills.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong development expertise and problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 10th at 2:00 PM to discuss cultural fit and next steps.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your interpersonal skills and company alignment.
We are pleased to propose an offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer. We are glad to hear that you find it suitable and exciting.
You have officially accepted the job offer for the Software Engineer role. Welcome to the team!
Your onboarding process has started. We look forward to helping you integrate smoothly into our engineering team.
The hiring process is now complete, and your profile is successfully added to the Engineering department.
